etymology.description: 說(說) (shuō, "speak") + 話(话) (huà, "speech") = to utter speech -> to speak
etymology.interpretation: The combination of 說(說) (shuō, "speak") and 話(话) (huà, "speech") logically means 'to speak' as it involves the action of speaking words or sentences.

parts.english: to speak; to talk; to say; to chat

examples.chinese: 请小声说话(請小聲說話)。
他说话很快(他說話很快)。
我们在说话(我們在說話)。
